#summary Fixing xterm-256color TERM

= Introduction =

OS X does not ship with the required files for the xterm-256color term. This document describes a proposed fix.


= Details =

1. Download [http://iterm2.com/terminfos/xterm-terminfo xterm-terminfo] from iterm2.com
 

2. Open a shell and run:
{{{
cd ~/Downloads
tic -e xterm-256color Downloads/xterm-terminfo*
}}}
You may see some errors about unknown capabilities, but they can be ignored.

3. In iTerm2, go to preferences->profiles->terminal and set "report terminal type" to "xterm-256color".

4. Open a new window and run vim or emacs. Verify that arrow keys and backspace work correctly.
